text: The MSI GS Series GS65 Stealth THIN-053 Gaming Laptop GTX 1070 i7-8750H 15.6" Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit does what it says on the tin. Good for competitive gaming, but the trackpad could be better. Had a minor issue with the initial setup taking longer than expected, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GS Series GS65 Stealth THIN-053 Gaming Laptop GTX 1070 i7-8750H 15.6" Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GS Series GS65 Stealth THIN-053 Gaming Laptop GTX 1070 i7-8750H 15.6" Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit!

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 is good, but I expected a bit more from the battery life on the MSI GS Series GS65 Stealth THIN-053 Gaming Laptop GTX 1070 i7-8750H 15.6" Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Valorant. The build quality of the MSI GS Series GS65 Stealth THIN-053 Gaming Laptop GTX 1070 i7-8750H 15.6" Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
